website_summaries.verdict: Similar to other Superga styles, except platform adds a little height and an extra touch of style.
pros: Old school sneaker look, but with a 1.5-inch platform
Platform helps with some of the support complaints of the COTU classic
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Takes a while to break in
May run large, so consider this when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Made well, comfy and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Love what they look like and the sole is very comfortable. I gave 4 instead of 5 as they gave me blisters when I didn’t wear ankle socks (sore hidden socks instead)
customer_reviews.author: marinad

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not for walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Paris and Rome because I read about them and had seen many people do the same. I got them a month before and wore them around to break them in no problem. But my first day in Paris they gave me horrible blisters on my toes. Moral of the story is they are cute and okay for a little walking, but not much more than that. I will still enjoy wearing them for times when a lot of walking isn’t necessary
customer_reviews.author: lauren.s

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews say order half size up, but i went ahead and ordered my true size and it fits perfect! I love the color and i love the platform! Gives me a little bit of height boost! Its not heavy! I love it
customer_reviews.author: chacha86

customer_reviews.title: Loose heel
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes! I love these 90s style platforms- they make an ordinary white shoe way more fun! My only complaint is that they are loose in the heel. I have to use an arch support/heel insert (The Walking Company is best; Superfeet is not bad but a little too thin- good for dress shoes but not these sneakers), which also helped give some support to an otherwise flat/no-support shoe. I also tied the shoes extra tight. The heel is still a little loose but I can deal. As for sizing, I'm normally a 9 and these shoes were just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wong

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I typically am between a 9 and 9.5 and opted for the 9 in these as most people indicated they ran slightly large. I would say these run at least a half size small if anything. Also, some people mentioned that the heel slides off when you walk. I didn't notice that too much, my right shoe does it a little but I wear no show socks that have padding on the back so it's not a problem! These are so versatile and cute! They remind me of my favorite platform sneakers I wore in the 90's. I will definitely be ordering more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size down!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten wear these out and about yet, but I ordered these originally in a size 8 (my normal size) and they were definitely too big. Ordered a 7.5 and they fit much better but I have quite narrow/skinny feet so they're not hugging them or anything. Have to tie them a little tighter to get a good fit. Very flat soled shoe which I expected and don't mind. So far I like these shoes just walking around the house. Also please disregard my socks lol
customer_reviews.author: Ansley Peurifoy

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Super love these shoes. I get compliments on them all the time. They didn’t give me blisters, either, and I get them really easily. I love the little lift they give me and how they make my legs look longer.
customer_reviews.author: Emili

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am consistently a US size 9 across every brand of shoe I've ever encountered... except Superga. This shoe runs a touch big, and the 8.5 is a perfect fit for me. They arrived in beautiful condition and as advertised. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugly as sin
customer_reviews.text: Hideous- daughter likes them. She gives 5 stars but I give 1 because they are ridiculous-looking and I paid for them
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: NOT durable at all. Hole developed in 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. She has worn them for approximately 2 1/2 months, and NOW THERES A HOLE IN ONE TOE! This never happened with shoes from Fila, Adidas, Converse, Toms, Or Vans. Let’s be clear: these are NOT being used for exercise, but literally for getting out of a car to go to school, walking around during classes, then getting back into the car at the front entrance. She has many other pairs of sneakers for her athletic sport. Will email superga and see how they respond.
customer_reviews.author: mom of twins

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing a shoe like this. I purchased them for my trip to the Phillippines which was where I experienced my first wear and what a mistake. I had blisters on the back of my foot by the time I returned to my Airbnb. I purchased gel protectors to add inside for the second use, however, the bagginess of the shoe still made the wear very uncomfortable. I have not taken them out of the box since. You can view pictures of me wearing the shoes in Phillippines and see the heel of my foot coming completely out of the shoe as I pose on Instagram @iamjackiewade
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wade

customer_reviews.title: I loved this shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shoes! I ordered one time with my normal number 9 1/2, and it came a little bit large, so I ordered again half number smaller(9) and fit perfectly. And it is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nicolaysen

customer_reviews.title: Cute casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for simple style not really comfort. These shoes are not comfortable enough to walk around in all day, but they are cute for making runs. The shoes does not bend with your foot very well due to the thick platform sole. I don't get much wear out of them as I did when I first purchased them. I wish I went for the slip on/backless version for easier wear, but this style was more than 50% off when I purchased and the other style was still full price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too big in ankles
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shoe. I bought these for a European trip (anticipate walking). I wear a size 7 1/2 and the first pair was way to big. My foot was slipping out of them. I returned them and bought a size 7 and my ankle still slips out. I wore them once so I am not sure I can even return them. I am afraid I am going to get blisters on my ankles. They definitely slip out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: way too big
customer_reviews.text: even though I selected the correct size according to the chart..the shoe was way too large.. great looking shoe however. This is the last time I will purchase shoes online as I have not found one that fits..so please do not look on my 1 star rating, I had to select something or the review would not be submitted. The shoe looks very well made and is a very substantial shoe..just not for me this time.
customer_reviews.author: timbuktoo

customer_reviews.title: Really large in the heel area
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7.5 US and I ordered that size for Superga and it was too big in the heel area of the shoe. So I returned it and got a size 7 but those were also big in the back of the shoe! My foot keeps coming out at the heel when I walk. It is really annoying with every step and I can also see it giving really bad blisters if you walk in them for too long with your foot coming in and out at the heel. They are very cute and look really nice on but It just seems too big at the heel area.
customer_reviews.author: Cali1924

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This one is a beaut. I just got them in the mail haven’t worn them out but did try them on and they are gorgeous. The perfect platform height for me. I don’t know how comfortable these are tho but can update later. p.s it’s true to size, whoever said buy size down...don’t. I usually wear 7 and I bought 6.5 because of all the reviews 🙄and it’s a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Niraj prasai

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes every weekend since November. They have held up nicely. Like most of the other comments, size a half size down. My heel still slips out the back but thats just how the shoe is shaped and made i think. They are super cute and stylish and make any outfit cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: May be a little bit large
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect. I tried on a pair at my local DSW to get a size reference and the 10 fit perfectly, but for some reason my size 10 in the yellow were a bit large from amazon. They’ll still fit fine as long as I wear a thicker sock, so I don’t want to go through the pain of going a size down and risk them being too small. Other than that, I’m in love. They’re super comfortable, came quickly, and I can’t wait to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Arko

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5 sometimes a 7. I ordered the 6.5 and a 7 according to the sizing. The 6.5 (36) fit but was slightly small, my toe somewhat rubs the side. The 7(37) was comfortable with no toe rubbing etc but seemed very big like maybe almost a size 7.5 or 8 US size. I kept the smaller ones to see if they would stretch some, and they are slowly. The 7 was just way to big and flopped. Overall they are super cute but the sizing is odd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff to walk
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are too stiff. They do not bend when you walk in them so your heel slips out the back. They are also very heavy but my main complaint is the stiffness and inability to bend with your step. My husband threw away the box or else I'd return them.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: sand stains easily, but they are so COMFORTABLE and gorgeous with any outfit
customer_reviews.text: absolutely in love with these! I was worried they would look too much like platforms, but these are not too bad. I wore these on a road trip in California and it was perfect with dresses, shorts, pants, jumpsuits. So comfortable! I wore to the beach and still can't get the sand out! Also, the wet sand stained it a bit and I cant wash these bc it's not recommended. a little heavy but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 6.5 but ordered a 6 since a lot of reviews suggested that. The shoes arrived fine and are really cute but extremely uncomfortable. The length of my shoe size is fine what is large is the ankle and surrounding area. That makes it so uncomfortable when walking. I tried using thick socks but it didn't help. I'm sad I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to get these shoes for the longest time and they had them on sale here! They do run .5-1 size too big depending on your foot. I normally wear a size 6.5 and a size 6 fits perfectly. Super cute and trendy. I haven't worn them out for long, so I can't speak about how comfortable they are, but they are easy to style.
customer_reviews.author: ADB

customer_reviews.title: Great fashion sneakers
customer_reviews.text: They look cool and are comfortable but are fashion sneakers not for even a small run when you are on a hurry because they are a bit heavy and the platform is stiff. However I still use them almost every day because they fit perfectly with every outfit
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but more for looks
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly cute and trendy, but I can’t imagine wearing them without an insert. Since the thickness doesn’t let them bend, your heel will slip in and out a bit without thicker socks or an insert. You definitely need to break them in for a while before wearing them anywhere with even a little bit of walking involved.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love platformed white sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love platformed white sneakers. It is the highest platform I have in my white sneaker collection. It is pretty comfy and super easy to match with any outfits. The only one thing is my feet is pretty narrow, so it feels a bit loose for me. I wish it comes in 0.5size smaller, maybe it will be better
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Leung

customer_reviews.title: There's are super cute and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: There's are super cute and easy to wear! They aren't the MOST comfortable sneakers I ever worn but they get the job done! They only issue I have is that I have to tie these EXTREMELY tight so that way the back of my foot doesn't come out of the shoe. The shoe itself is not big for me, it fits perfectly, but for some reason my heel slips out when I walk even if I am wearing socks.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They fit just like the other reviewers described. They are a bit heavy because they are platform sneakers. There is no arch support, but I bought insoles which fixed that. I have a bit wider forefoot and a very narrow heel area and others had complained that the heel area was too roomy and I found the same situation. However, I adjusted the lacing and I wear a thicker sock liner and they do great!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Fave sneakers right now
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, have gotten so many compliments. I read reviews about shoe being a little big so I went a half size down. I think I could’ve gotten a whole size down instead but I wasn’t sure and did t want to have to return them if they were too tight. I’m a size 7 and got a size 6.5. I’m just going to buy thick insoles and that should solve the problem of looseness. Other than that it’s a great shoe and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! Good fit and cute design. A fashion stylist recommended that I add these to my wardrobe. She told me to go to Nordstrom...$80. I was over the moon finding them on Amazon for less. (The platform limits the flexibility of the soul so which to regular sneaks for long walks). I get compliments every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Run large.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I did as other reviews suggested and bought a size down. I’m normally a US6 and bought a US5 but if you like a little more wiggle room for your toes I’d just go down the half size. They don’t have any bend in them either but I was expecting that. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee M.

customer_reviews.title: Try 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a must in your wardrobe! I’m 5’5” and these give me that added lift that’s just right. As the other reviews have stated, they are slightly bigger. I’m a 7 and should have gotten a 6 1/2. I do have a slighhhty wide foot so I went with the 7 anyway and shouldn’t have. I put inserts in the front to push my heel back so they won’t slide.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel O

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Supergas run big, size down! I love mine. BUT, don’t count on cushion if you’ve never tried them on. Their minimalist sneakers. I can walk around but not for extended periods of time. I got a blister on my pinky toe and heal when I wore on long walk.
customer_reviews.author: roshambo

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time ordering these shoes. definitely order a half size down to get the right fit. I really like how they look but fair warning I had to replace my last pair because the sole starting coming off. I was using them a lot and had them for about 8 months before this happened. I really like them and wear them every day so its worth it but don't expect them them to last a super long.
customer_reviews.author: alissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am typically a size 8 in shoes. For these I ordered a US size 7.5/EU 38 and they fit perfectly. The shoes are platform so they do have a little weight to them. This is fine but causes the back to move a bit when waking (even if tied tight) which is why I imagine some reviewers reported discomfort/ankle pain. They do not feel totally flat inside but they do not have a great amount of support. These seem more fashion over function - I think they will be comfortable during daily activities but are not really for sports/hiking/etc. Great to catch them on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: beware of fakes?
customer_reviews.text: MAY HAVE GOTTEN FAKES. The label on the back of mine deteriorated very quickly. The shoes fit well & are suuuuuuper fashionable, but like others were saying, there's no support and they're not the MOST comfortable. (festivals = no, walk around the city = ehh, if there's chances to sit) The most redeeming factor is how cute these are.
customer_reviews.author: avavava.

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy sneakers. They are a tiny bit big because I am an in between size so I always go half a size up. I didn’t need to break these in at all. The first time I wore them was to a music festival (lots of walking) and my feet didn’t hurt nor get blisters. Slightly heavier than normal sneakers, but that was to be expected since they’re platforms and the bottoms are thick.
customer_reviews.author: CMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Get your normal size.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. However, I am normally an 8. I sized down to a 7.5 because of the other reviews. There is no way I can even wear socks with these without my toe going through the front. I would suggest getting your NORMAL size and then getting heel insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute, but Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend sizing down a half a size. When it comes to comfort, they’re not comfortable at all. They’re extremely “flat” feeling. Also, when you walk, it feels like your heel is slightly slipping out of the shoe-not a lot, just a little. These shoes are super cute on, and nice to look at, but had I known those things listed above, I might not have bought them. So, I guess you have to decide which is more important-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop thinking and just get them!
customer_reviews.text: In love with these shoes! Been eyeing these for a while and finally bought them. Couldn't be happier. Went with the reviews and ordered a half size smaller (a 6.5 instead of a 7) and they fit perfectly. They are platform (don't bend, duh) and a bit heavy but great quality shoe and exactly what I was looking for. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Maria H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but not as comfortable as hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Although I loved the chunky design, the stiff sole and lack of heel padding meant that my heel slid up and down as I walked. I could see that I would get a blister if I continued, so I returned this attractive shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sambar

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get a good fit and come used?
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, but these are hard to get a perfect fit. My package came with hair, so I think these are used? Which is why the price is a lot cheaper than the actual Superga website. I retuned these, but if you can get the right fit these shoes are super cute and eventually break in after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful white sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase but runs a little large. First time buying Superga, I would go for have a number less on size. I guess it depends on your type of feet, mine are a little thin so they slip out a bit but the sizing is right. Really comfortable. High quality shoe material.
customer_reviews.author: ANA ROMERO

customer_reviews.title: Real Supergas!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are the best and I was concerned that these were going to be knock-offs because they're selling for below what Supergas usually go for but after closely comparing them to my existing pair of real Supergas, as far as I can tell these are authentic!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Andersen

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are an amazing quality but run half a size too big
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really cute but offer no arch support and run half a size to a full size big. I am usually an 8.5 or an 8 but had to order a 7.5. Although they are kind of on the tighter side, I recommend sizing down half a size so you can insert heal inserts for support. Over all, really cute shoes for a relatively good size.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I kept looking at them on another website, but they were $80 and I didn't want to pay that much. I'm so glad I looked on Amazon. I saved $20! The shoes are awesomely comfortable and I love the way they look. The platforms are great because I am only 5' tall.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hines

customer_reviews.title: Heel keeps lifting up out of shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute but after returning them once because they were too big and my heel kept lifting up. The smaller second pair was too tight and my heels still kept lifting up. Wore them for an hour feet were aching and gave me blisters. Waiting for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a 7.5 in almost every shoe I buy. For this shoe, I sized down a half size due to other reviews stating the shoe slips off your heel. I am glad I only went down a half size because other wise my toes would have been too tight. The shoe still does slip if you don't tie it really tight. I will invest in the insoles as suggested by another reviewer. I am very happy with this buy and cant wait to wear these all spring and summer they were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need a 39.5!
customer_reviews.text: I’m an 8 1/2 or 9 in athletic shoes. I need arch support so a stiff shoe like this is ok. However, they come in European sizes and 39 is too short and 40 is to loose. So, these shoes aren’t meant for me. Super cute and just what I wanted, though.
customer_reviews.author: Greek Gal

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoes, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter during an Amazon Fashion sale and got such a great price. She had them in navy (birthday gift from friends) and wanted them in white. They fit true to size and she says they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KLV

customer_reviews.title: great shoe will need minor adjustments and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These run large Im a 6.5US so I ordered the 6US (36). My foot measures 9in long. some tips to wearing these: You will need to add a back of heel non-slip pad to prevent rubbing/ slipping
customer_reviews.author: RmP

customer_reviews.title: Love! But a little on the larger size
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting these forever! I love them so much. I do have to say they are a little bigger than what I am use to, I bought a size 6.5 which I normally wear that or a 7. But I honestly could have gotten a 6 I think. I’ve already worn them, and it’s fine so I am not going to go through the hassle of the return and order process again. Mainly because I love them and couldn’t wait to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Kozak

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BUT NO GO!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look, but I have narrow heels and they were so wide there that my foot lifted out of them when I walked. Tried two pairs of socks...no go. Also, the thick soles are not flexible...I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Flattering
customer_reviews.text: I love the platform style and they are so comfortable. I am 4'11" and it makes me look taller and makes my legs look longer. They are heavier than I expected so it may not be suitable for long walks. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: N. Green

customer_reviews.title: Size down!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe so far. I fluctuate between an 8 1/2 and sometimes a 9 ( since having kids, weird) So I originally ordered an 8 1/2 and it was way too big so I returned it for an 8 so much better. I can at least now wear them they do still slip the teeniest bit but not completely off my heel now! As long as you have some good no-show socks they are awesome! Will totally buy more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe even though the sole is awkwardly thick. I would have kept them if the length was more like a standard size 7 instead of a 7 1/2. My heels literally would come out of the shoes with every step, so I sent them back new.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: High quality fabric and style. You can wear them with a skirt, shorts, and even  a dress.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw that Amazon had these sneakers available and was $50.00 less than my local sneaker store I JUMPED on them extremely quickly. There so comfortable I think I'm going to get another pair. I love them so much. You will too
customer_reviews.author: constance weber

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but can't wear this to walk
customer_reviews.text: i tried on, it slip from the back once you tried to walk, is a nice pair of shoes to put on the display, not for walking, don't buy them if you want a comfortable shoes and could walk.
customer_reviews.author: Kmomoda

customer_reviews.title: So cute and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Order half a size less than usual. But I love these shoes theyre so cute. Not much arch support so I recommend getting gel inserts if youre gonna wear these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right Price...just needs to add a sock!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 6.5, since I'm usually between 6.5 and 7. But They were a little looser than I expected. However, I think if I slip on a sock -- it'll solve the issue. Was looking at this shoe on the Superga website but always hesitated on the price. Thank goodness for Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I am a true size 7 in all shoes and the 6.5 (37) fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: obsessedamazon

customer_reviews.title: They really do run big
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, they are just a little more stylish than the regular style ( w/out platform), and I like the extra height. I am disappointed though that they run bigger than the non platform style. I bought the exact same size in the platforms (41) and they feel about a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing. I ordered a 39 and was scared ...
customer_reviews.text: Weird sizing. I ordered a 39 and was scared it wouldn’t fit as I’m usually 40. These shoes DO run big. Even these require proper tying of the laces to keep them in place. My feet are not W but a little over the normal width. They don’t seem uncomfortable at all and they don’t look exaggerated on my feet either.
customer_reviews.author: ItzLetz

customer_reviews.title: Oddly made platforms.
customer_reviews.text: Funny fit at the ankles. The size is right but feet would slip out when walking. Laces were tightened. Still feet would slip out. Added insoles. Still no . Very odd fit. Had other superga trainers and had no problem with the fit. Will return. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: A little large but so cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Got so many compliments on these they do run a little large though. But great quality and super cute and a fraction of the cost! Just size down!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: They wear out quickly. You’ll be buying another pair in 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes, they are comfortable but I bought my last pair on May 26th and 3.5 months later I’m buying another pair because they already have holes in them. 😑
customer_reviews.author: Lulu V

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BRAND OF SHOE SO MUCH THAT I WILL ...
customer_reviews.text: WITH THE SUPERGA BRAND SOMETIMES YOU HAVE TO PUT AN INSOLE IN OR A HEEL LIFT IN, ON THESE I ONLY NEED ONE HEEL LIFT IN THE RIGHT SHOE. I LOVE THIS BRAND OF SHOE SO MUCH THAT I WILL MAKE IT FIT.. I WEAR AN 8 1/2 AND THATS THE SIZE THAT I BUY ALWAYS..
customer_reviews.author: cheryl tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Size down, but so in love
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad i listened to the reviews and went half a size down. These shoes are so perfect! They are so cute and stylish. The toe box feels SLIGHTLY tight, given that i sized down, but my true size would have been way too large.
customer_reviews.author: VLD

customer_reviews.title: Stiff & not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It has taken a long time to break these shoes in, I don’t know what the difference is, I had a pair in the past, but these seemed different, too stiff, just never have became comfortable! Sorry but it’s true
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Superga shoes in the platform style and regular. It is very hard to find shoes that have a decent amount of arch support, etc. The Superga platform style feels as if it has significantly more support than the regular. And of course, seems like they have 100's of colors. And I wear a 41 and Superga sizing seems right on point.
customer_reviews.author: CLK

customer_reviews.title: Cute and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Cute sneakers, very versatile. Runs slightly big especially at heel. Bought a size 7.5 or size 8 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes ! I was able to wear on my vacation with comfort if you don’t mind the extra weight on feet from the platform . This color does get dirty fast but it matched many outfits!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Arrived USED and Covered in human and animal HAIR.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these in the mail today and when I open the box, they were covered in hair, both human and some sort of animal. The souls are filthy as though someone has already worn them as well as the inside of the shoes. You can literally see the toll marks inside of the shoe. The top of shoes were also dirty; these were obviously worn previously!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Frost

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a 8. I got a 7.5 after reading the reviews. They are wide around the ankle but a little tight in the toes. If I would’ve gotten an 8 they would’ve been too big. So hopefully with time they’ll loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Ouch blisters!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but super uncomfortable. 10/10 will give you blisters. 10/10 would recommend to my worst enemy. - Kara M.
customer_reviews.author: James and Kara

customer_reviews.title: Go a full size down
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, they're exactly like what I imagine they would be. The only problem is they do run big, I'm usually a size 7 and I ordered a 6.5 since the other reviews said to go half a size down but they still are big on me, I couldn't return them since I'm not from the US but I would recommend to go a full size down, other than that the shoes are really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Urbizo

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes- Order Half a Size Down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half a size down because that’s what all the reviews said to do and they fit perfectly! These shoes are very comfy, but I would definitely recommend wearing socks with them until they’re broken in. I’ve gotten so many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I read So many negative reviews that I almost did not buy these shoes,, And thank god I chose to buy them. They are true to size, they're exactly like the picture and the brand. I LOVE them. I wear a size 6 and 6.5, but ordered and 6 because some say too big and I could've gotten the 6.5 , but they still fit fine! ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Seven Durham

customer_reviews.title: Trendy not practical
customer_reviews.text: These are style shoes only. Not very practical. They are not comfortable to walk in. This Amazon Price is great . They are much more expensive elsewhere. They are cute and trendy but must be laced right or your heel will fall out of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, run a bit big
customer_reviews.text: They are a teensy bit loose, but they’re some of my favorite shoes!! I’d seen other reviews and didn’t think the platform looked thick enough, but it’s perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Knox

customer_reviews.title: Want to love them
customer_reviews.text: SO stinking cute. But not the comfiest shoe in planet. I was looking for a walking shoe that was more comfy than my chucks, these ain’t them. But again I wear them when I can (Short amounts of time) because they couldn’t be any more adorable. They are tight on my big toe but slip off my ankle 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in my normal shoe size, 9. I literally cannot walk in them they come right off my foot with each step i take.. I bought shoe inserts and those don't help either. I have even doubled up on the shoe inserts and nothing helps. So bummed that I waited too long to return. They are a huge disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Blocky & heel slips out
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes, but walking around is like strapping blocks of wood to your feet, no bend at all. Heel also slips out even though I went down half a size as recommended. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kayelle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected, I read many reviews saying to size down if you're in between sizes. I'm a size 6.5 or size 7, so I went with a 6.5 on these and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for walking
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and the heel of the foot sometimes lifts up a bit out of the shoe. Now comfortable for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Way too small and not to size. Will not return but I don’t recommend unless you order 2 sizes larger then they would be too big in the width
customer_reviews.author: Mary Winn

customer_reviews.title: very heavy, but cute!!
customer_reviews.text: the soles of this shoe make it very heavy and the back slides off your ankle as you walk. but other than that they are great !! also wear no show socks with these, it looks so much better and put together
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Superga doesn’t fit like ordinary shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a little difficult to fit properly. Heel slips up but unable to wear smaller size in length.
customer_reviews.author: Vera R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now before they are not in in fashion anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Although I received them somewhat large, I already knew that Superga's shoes are all like that. It is very good quality and I love them. Although they are white they don't get dirty that easy. The price in Amazon was cheaper than in other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes came in dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came in dirty. It waz marked with pen all over the shoes. I ordered two pairs and both pairs were ALL DIRTY. This is totally unacceptable and I will be requesting for refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac P.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes came stained.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get these in the mail but was disappointed when I took them out of the box and saw that they were already stained on the heel (see photos). They had not been worn, came like that fresh out of the box. Wish I had got a different color maybe something other than white would look less bad with the stains. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, not the feel - from other reviews I suspected that might be the case. I can wear these out and be fairly comfortable when I know I won’t be walking much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer complaint
customer_reviews.text: I received these shoes on 10/15 and the bottom of the shoe has already come apart after only a few wears. Very upset. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: One of the holes (or grommet) came off on my third time wearing the shoes! It makes me wonder if the pairs on Amazon are authentic. I like that it's platform and it's pretty comfortable. Wish I can return, but I threw away the box already.
customer_reviews.author: Gemina

customer_reviews.title: Reordered Twice
customer_reviews.text: I reordered these twice and they were still too small. The fabric is very stiff and gave me blisters immediately.
customer_reviews.author: cpyle

customer_reviews.title: Size down!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and they're awesome for Summer but they are HUGE. I'm typically always a size 8, I went with a 7.5 after reading reviews, but they were falling off me when I would walk. I had to buy two different types of heel inserts to make them smaller, but they're still a little big. Size down one complete size.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several platform sneakers and these fit and are comfortable. Only negative thing Is find them to be somewhat heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Anna

customer_reviews.title: GET A COUPLE SIZES DOWN
customer_reviews.text: love the shoes but wayy too big! definitely order a couple sizes down! they are really heavy shoes so your foot will literally flop right out of them when you walk! super cute though i will definitely be buying a smaller pair once i return the ones i got!
customer_reviews.author: kylee

customer_reviews.title: CUTEST SNEAKERS EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are so cute! I wouldn’t say they’re the best for arch support but they are the best platform sneakers I’ve tried! I usually wear a 7 in most shoes but I knew I wear a 6.5 in supergas and they fit perfect! So i would advise you to size down.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Warthen

product_meta.title: Superga Women's 2790 Acotw Platform Sneaker Fashion
product_meta.description: Superga has got you covered on fashion-forward, everyday footwear. This classic kick packs fashionable appeal in a chunky, rubber platform heel! adorable with fringe denim shorts and a simple tee, these unlined cotton upper platforms are equally as sweet at nighttime with a tight, nautical mini dress.
feature_bullets: Superga sneakers tend to run slightly large. We recommend sizing down by 1/2 size.
